usefulItems: bowl, frying pan, large bowl, non-stick frying pan, stove top
title: Asian-style pork noodles

ingredients.content: 6 sprigs fresh coriander stalks only, leaves reserved for garnishing
2 spring onions/shallots, white part only, cut into halves (reserve green part for garnishing)
4 spring onions/shallots, white part only, cut into halves, green part reserved for garnishing
15 - 20 snow peas, cut into thin slices

preparations.content: Soak vermicelli noodles as per packet instructions. Drain, cut into short lengths and set aside.
Place garlic, ginger, chilli, coriander stalks and white part of spring onions/shallots into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add mince, flour, chestnuts, soy sauce, salt and pepper and combine <b>30 sec//speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl, add reserved vermicelli noodles and stir until combined. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat and add oil. Add mince mixture and fry for 20-30 minutes, stirring regularly until crispy and golden brown. Meanwhile, continue with recipe.
Place water into mixing bowl and heat <b>5 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Add egg noodles and cook  <b>3-4 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Drain, rinse under warm water and transfer into a large bowl. Set aside.
Place white part of spring onions/shallots, garlic, carrot, chillies and butter into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>2 min/100°C/speed <b>.

Add cabbage, kecap manis, oyster sauce, soy sauce, pepper, water and snow peas and cook <b>3 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Toss cabbage mixture through noodles. Top with green part of spring onions/shallots, coriander leaves, fried shallots and reserved mince mixture just before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Substitute noodles for vegetable zoodles or noodles of choice.
You can serve this dish warm or cold (making it great for lunches the next day).
